• the most senior clinician in the relevant disciplines at the facility (e.g. HOD or Clinical Manager for obstetrics,
but also for anaesthetics, medicine etc where relevant)
• The assistant nurse manager for maternity and for other sections where relevant to the case (e.g. theatre,
med
ical wards and casualty)
• at least one of the top management of the facility
• relevant member(s) of the DCST (includes obstetric specialist, advanced midwife, family physician, PHC nurse,
and anaesthetist)
